#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements
 =Change Log=

 * Whats new/fixed in v1.1 (1-2-2008)
   # kozyr added a nice seek graph
   # Redid the way the move list was laid out. It is now part of the layout instead of being in a split pane. Its orientation changes depending on where you have the holdings panel setup. You can also show and hide the move list form a button in the boards toolbar.
   # Added an option to show a piece jail in the holdings panel.
   # Selected both the start/end square for a move instead of just the end square.
   # Fixed the bug where the second char was eaten when you typed two chars quickly in something other than the input field in the console.
   # Added a fill background option for square selection mode.
   # Added an option to store games in one pgn file instead of seperate ones.
   # Fixed a bug where you could not change the foreground color of fonts in the Chat Text tab.
   # Fixed some move list parsing bugs.
   # Redid the default console toolbar. Removed the sought button, changed bugwho to bugwho gp and changed the order of the buttons a bit.
   # Added a Right 3x2 option for a holdings panel mode.
   # Fixed some resize bugs and layout problems with the different holdings panel modes.
   # Changed the wording of the checkbox preferences to be easier to understand.
   # Added options to show/hide move list by default for bug/chess observing and playing.
   # Added Winboard and right oriented options in the ChessGui tab.
   # Made up time text configurable.
   # Changed the way telling to a channel/person tab works. Now the text is automatically prepended to the input panel. You can hit escape to erase it and type a normal fics command (like you would enter on the console).
   # Added game result to pgn
   # Added a diagonal line square selection mode.
   # Added a granite, and some paper background images.
   # Added a way to support cropping of a background image, or reusing it for all squares.

 * Whats new/fixed in v1.02 (12-19-2007)
    # Added code to reuse the current frame if it is available instead of creating a new one.
    # Added smart move.
    # Added click move drag and drop mode.
    # Changed premove drop in bughouse to wait until you have the piece in hand before the premove is issued, even if it is your turn.
    # Fixed a bughouse bug where the screen would flash to an old position at the start of a game.
    # Fixed a bug where rarely a style 12 messages would be sent to the server console if the message containing the style 12 was greater than 600 characters (changed this to 900).
    # Fixed the bug where a box would be displayed in invisible move mode on macs and some windows installs.


 * Whats new/fixed in v1.01 (12-16-2007)
    # Added bughouse move lists.
    # Added right click drop pieces/clear for bsetup in examine mode
    # Added the ability to switch interface into ex mode when a user is made examiner of an obs game.
    # Added Fill Screen option in the window menu.
    # Added logging support in general tab.Console logging/channel logging/individual tell logging are all supported.

 * Whats new/fixed in v1.0 (12-10-2007)
    # Removed cursor caching.
    # Add chess set image caching and chess board square image caching.
    # Added different sound implementations, windows gets javax sound, generic gets applet sound,osx gets applet sound.
    # Added a move list. Currently it does not support bughouse, ex mode, or adjusting holdings in zh.
    # Fixed clock not stopping/starting bugs.
    # Changed drag and drop implementation, switched over to java DND. This should fix the drag and drop bugs.
    # Added sound for tell/ptell/challenge that plays only if speech is disabled or disabled for the particular function needed (tell,ptell,notification,etc).
    # Refactored package names to be more intuitive.
    # Added a new invisible move cursor for OSX. The crosshairs were previously being used.
    # Changed obsMove sound to a clicking sound. The sound would not play well on speakers that didnt have midrange/base.
    # Added checkboxes for open,sl,bugopen instead of buttons. The buttons were misleading.
    # Added a preference to control x when calculating chess piece size: square - x = chess piece size. This allows for smaller pieces and easier drag n drop if desired.
    # Added a preferences for move list location.
    # Refactored some thread changes made earlier to attempt to utilize less threads in osx.
    # Added some performance enhancing code when changing chess pieces on a chess board for efficency.
    # Fixed a promote capture bug where the move would fail if it was a capture.
    # Fixed bug where keyboard input was not being forwarded if playing a game.
    # Added forward/backward buttons to the move list.
    # Fixed some zh algebraic parsing problems with move list.
    # Added a preferences for controlling if an unfollow is issued when starting a game you are playing.
